verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David לוּלֵ֣י <S%H3884><s%> If יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> been לָ֑נוּ יֹֽאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> say נָ֝א <S%H4994><s%> now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> who was on our side now may Israel

לוּלֵ֣י <S%H3884><s%> If יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> [it had not been] the LORD שֶׁהָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> been לָ֑נוּ בְּק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> rose up עָלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> who was on our side when men
אֲ֭זַי <S%H233><s%> Then חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> quick בְּלָע֑וּנוּ <S%H1104><s%> they had swallowed us up בַּחֲר֖וֹת <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפָּ֣ם <S%H639><s%> when their wrath בָּֽנוּ׃

אֲ֭זַי <S%H233><s%> Then הַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters שְׁטָפ֑וּנוּ <S%H7857><s%> had overwhelmed נַ֝֗חְלָה <S%H5158><s%> us the stream עָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> had gone over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over נַפְשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H5315><s%> our soul
אֲ֭זַי <S%H233><s%> Then עָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> had gone over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <S%H5315><s%> our soul הַ֝מַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters הַזֵּֽידוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H2121><s%> the proud

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD שֶׁלֹּ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not נְתָנָ֥נוּ <S%H5414><s%> who hath not given טֶ֝֗רֶף <S%H2964><s%> us [as] a prey לְשִׁנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8127><s%> to their teeth

נַפְשֵׁ֗נוּ <S%H5315><s%> Our soul כְּצִפּ֥וֹר <S%H6833><s%> as a bird נִמְלְטָה֮ <S%H4422><s%> is escaped מִפַּ֪ח <S%H6341><s%> out of the snare י֫וֹקְשִׁ֥ים <S%H3369><s%> of the fowlers הַפַּ֥ח <S%H6341><s%> the snare נִשְׁבָּ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> is broken וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we נִמְלָֽטְנוּ׃ <S%H4422><s%> and we are escaped

עֶ֭זְרֵנוּ <S%H5828><s%> Our help בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> [is] in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> who made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth
